Reviews.Title: Cheap Clock
Reviews.Author: M. Garcia "Nileblack72"
Reviews.Content: Bought this clock for use in my office. It is built on cheap plastic. Its basically a dollar store clock with an old cell phone camera. The video quality is mediocre at best. It is WAY TOO overpriced. I took a leap of faith with this purchase. You are probably better off buying a pc camera and mounting it on  a clock or fixture somehow. If it were between 40 and 60 bucks then i.d recommend.Pros:Works as described (MUST HAVE SDcard)Cons:Cheapalmost non existent user interphaseVideo Quality (used at HD setting of 1280x720), this is probably due to the encoder/ compression used. (avi)Price

Reviews.Title: not so hidden clock camera
Reviews.Author: Rico
Reviews.Content: Why would you waste all my Saturday afternoon? I had to wait for the post man and then spend hours figuring it would not work as advertised. What did I do to you besides buy your seemly nice products? I was wrong.Why won't you'r files play on any of the current standard media players?Why don't you tell us what operating systems this works with?Why did you imply that a standard player should work, WRONG?I do like the remote control; very nice, but a wasted option cosidering the lack of an on board power supply to run the camera.Why don't you offer a CD with the icm.xvid codec, it's not standard with media players? I can't find a safe place to download it. At lesat offer on your web site that's so dam hard to find.Why don't you tell people the recorder must be on for the computer to see the device or contents of the SD card?Why not install a wide angle lense?Why is it so hard to find your web site? You can't even google it.Why don't you say anything about how long it takes to charge the DVR battery or how long that charge will last? Because they aint one, dummys. So why make us use a AA battery when it has to be pluged in any how DUMMYs?What is so hidden about info@securitymaninc.com ;a wall clock camera that has a cord comming from it? Any idiot can tell you modern quarts clocks use batteries, not a smart idea with the DC adapter. Geesh, spend some time and install a nice optional lithium rechargeble like the blue tooth headsets for true wireless function.Why do I get an invalid date error when I click save afterupdating time/ date and other settings? Why when set to low res, I still get an *mb file for only 44 secs of record time. Your hoping we just give in a set it to erase as needed or assuem it recorded nothing. Sorry!Why won't the camera record with USB conected?These are not complaints, it's feedback. I think you have a good start on your products; I like many of them. Regardless, if you can't get this simple clock right, I would be afraid to spend more money on some of your better stuff. It's clear your tech writers don't speak native English from the looks of your manuals; perhaps you have a job for me???I spent $200 and I think I should get my money back. As nice as it is, it's not what I was told it would be and that's why its sucks along with all the reasons I stated above.  Simply put, cheap! Don't forget to pay me when you upgrade my ideas into your products. I'm ok with 1099 but I would rather a check made out to cash please. Reviews.Title: Securityman ClockCamDVR
Reviews.Author: Dale I. Patterson
Reviews.Content: Item was very hard to setup. Its worked somewhat, then stopped after a day... No REC light, no power light. Its just as expensive clock....

Reviews.Title: Great product! Easy to use and control with remote!
Reviews.Author: Javier G. Serrano
Reviews.Content: Works great! Easy to use and control with remote! Cheap solution for surveillance. Easily transferred video to computer using Micro SD memory chip!

Reviews.Title: It's Huge
Reviews.Author: William
Reviews.Content: The wall clock is 14 1/2 inches in diameter.  I was going to use it on a residential wall but I don't have a wall big enough to put it on and it would definitely look out of place in a residence.  Before I bought it, I searched and searched for its dimensions but to no avail.  This industrial size clock could only be used a BIG commercial building.  I guess they don't want you to know its size so they can suck you in like I was.

Reviews.Title: Camera Clock
Reviews.Author: Clif
Reviews.Content: I am very fascinated with the quality od this product. I am pleased with the size of the clock face. The clock has met my expectations and the installation directions were user-friendly, making my overall experience pleasant.
